lines: Jesu Muvuni mu Betelehemu, Wakazyalilwa muciba kuya;
Alilumbwe izina lya Mwami, Wakafwida ime,
Alilumbwe izina lya Mwami, Wakafwida ime.
Jesu Muvuni a Kalivali, Wakabbadela kuula ndime;
Kuti ndi anguluke mucibi, Wakafwida ime
Jesu Muvuni webo wakale, Wakandiyanda azibi zyangu;
Akundi tola mu munzi wako, Ulaita ime,
Ula ita ime, Ula ita ime,
Akundi tola mu munzi wako, Ula ita ime.
Jesu Muvuni uya kubola, Mucisyomyo cakwe ulaboola;
Ndiya kumubona kaseluka, Ku bolela ime,
